mapper.insert: insert into board2(bid,title,writer,content,filepath) values((select nvl(max(bid),0)+1 from board2),#{title},#{writer},#{content},#{filepath})
mapper.select: select * from board2 where writer like '%'||#{searchContent}||'%' order by bid desc
mapper.update: update board2 set title=#{title},content=#{content} where bid=#{bid}
